DOC.brief_summary: Matching-adjusted indirect comparison tobramycin solution ( TIS ) versus aztreonam lysine ( AZLI ) use TIS patient level clinical trial data AZLI aggregate clinical trial data publish literature .
DOC.brief_title: Indirect Comparison Tobramycin Solution Inhalation Versus Aztreonam Lysine Inhalation Treatment Cystic Fibrosis
